readme:
# Page2Image: Convert PDF to PNG Workflow (Multi-Page Support)

## How It Works

This workflow automatically converts each page of a multi-page PDF into high-quality PNG images. It uses the [PDF.co API](https://developer.pdf.co/api/introduction/index.html) in the background to process the PDF and generate individual images for every page. The entire process is streamlined, making it ideal for converting documents quickly and efficiently.

## Set Up Steps

  1. Create a [PDF.co](http://PDF.co) Account: [Sign up for a PDF.co account](https://www.pdf.co/) and get your API Key. This will be required for authentication.

  2. Import the Workflow into n8n: Add the workflow to your n8n instance.

  3. Enter Your API Key: In the workflow, enter your [PDF.co](http://PDF.co) API Key to authenticate the process.

  4. Test the Workflow: Run the workflow, and check that each page of the sample PDFs has been converted to a PNG image.

  5. Replace the sample PDFs with your own PDFs and get started automatically converting your PDFs to images!




Setup should take just a few minutes, assuming you already have your [PDF.co](http://PDF.co) API Key.

## Getting Started

This workflow requires [PDF.co](http://PDF.co)’s API for converting PDF pages into PNG images. You’ll need an active [PDF.co](http://PDF.co) account and your unique API Key. Once you have that, just plug it into the workflow, and you’re ready to convert multi-page PDFs into PNGs instantly!

## Customizing the Workflow

The workflow currently uses sample PDF files to demonstrate the conversion process. To make it work for your use case, replace the sample PDF logic with your own logic to retrieve PDFs. Whether the PDFs are uploaded, fetched from a URL, or pulled from a storage service, just plug your retrieval method into the workflow, and it will handle the conversion seamlessly.

## API Reference

The [PDF.co](http://PDF.co) Web API is REST-based, ensuring secure and efficient communication. All requests are transmitted over HTTPS to protect your data.

To use the API, you simply authenticate with your API Key and make requests to initiate the conversion. For this workflow, your API Key allows seamless communication with [PDF.co](http://PDF.co) to convert PDF pages into images.
readme_zh:
# Page2Image：PDF转PNG工作流（支持多页）

## 工作原理

本工作流自动将多页PDF的每一页转换为高质量PNG图像。后台使用[PDF.co API](https://developer.pdf.co/api/introduction/index.html)处理PDF文件，为每个页面生成独立图像。整个流程经过优化，能快速高效地完成文档转换。

## 配置步骤

1. 注册[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)账户：[立即注册](https://www.pdf.co/)获取API密钥（用于身份验证）

2. 导入工作流到n8n：将工作流添加至您的n8n实例

3. 输入API密钥：在工作流中填写您的[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)API密钥完成认证

4. 测试工作流：运行工作流，验证示例PDF的所有页面是否成功转为PNG图像

5. 替换示例PDF：放入您自己的PDF文件，即可开始自动转换

若已持有[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)API密钥，整个配置过程仅需几分钟。

## 开始使用

本工作流依赖[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)的API实现PDF转PNG功能。您需要有效的[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)账户及专属API密钥。获取密钥后，只需将其填入工作流，即可立即实现多页PDF批量转换。

## 自定义工作流

当前工作流使用示例PDF文件演示转换流程。您可以通过以下方式适配实际需求：替换示例PDF获取逻辑，改为从URL抓取、存储服务调用或上传接口获取PDF文件。无论采用何种获取方式，只需接入工作流即可实现无缝转换。

## API参考

[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)的Web API采用REST架构，通过HTTPS协议保障通信安全高效。使用时只需通过API密钥完成认证，发送请求即可触发转换。本工作流中，您的API密钥将作为与[PDF.co](http://PDF.co)服务的安全通信凭证，实现PDF页面向图像的转换。
